item.title: Trump designates Venezuela government a 'terrorist' regime, orders blockade of sanctioned oil tankers
item.description: In a post on Truth Social, Trump said "Venezuela is completely surrounded by the largest Armada ever assembled in the History of South America."

item.title: Bill to ease Big Tech project permits advances in House
item.description: Backers say the SPEED Act is crucial to helping the U.S. beat out China and other global competitors for leadership in AI.
